verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Savior I come newline Quiet my soul remember newline Redemptions hill newline Where your blood was spilled newline For my ransom

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines: Everything I once held dear newline I count it all as lost

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines: Lead me to the cross newline where your love poured out newline Bring me to my knees newline Lord I lay me down newline Rid me of myself newline I belong to you newline Lead me, newline Lead me to the cross

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines: You were as I newline Tempted and trialed newline You are newline The word became flesh newline Bore my sin and death newline Now You're risen

verse.name: c1d
verse.lines: To your heart newline To your heart newline Lead me to your heart newline Lead me to your heart
